page.title: 02INTRODUCTION
page.content: The estate is still growing in the 1980's.The industry of the area ranges from very old factones and firms first developed in the nineteen century suvh as Ferguson Printers or Stead McAlpine to the very modern large factory founded by Pirelli to make tyres in the late 1960s. The area is a pleasant one to live in with the housing been well cared for.There are good modern primary schools and a large comprehensive school.The area is served by churches of all denoninations and a very active community centres and numerous social clubs and public houses.There is a good mix of shops and a regular bus service to the town centre.The area is a thriving one with most people being in employment.There is a sence of community spirit which is reflected in the well maintained look of the area.
